entry.title: lklynet/injectly: Injectly is a simple, self-hosted code injector app designed to streamline the process of managing and injecting scripts across multiple websites.

entry.title: SK3CHI3/universal-resource-hub: Universal Resource Finder A global platform designed to help users discover free, high-quality resources across various categories like technology, design, education, and business. This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources. Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly

entry.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
entry.content: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.

entry.title: bayethelungah/Tode-Server: The Tode Server is a lightweight Express.js backend built with TypeScript. It processes uploaded package.json files to parse and resolve Node.js dependencies, providing structured data to the client for visualization.
entry.content: The Tode Server is a lightweight Express.js backend built with TypeScript. It processes uploaded package.json files to parse and resolve Node.js dependencies, providing structured data to the client for visualization.

entry.title: bayethelungah/Tode-Client: The Tode Client application is a lightweight, React-based frontend designed to visualize the dependency structure of a Node.js project.
entry.content: The Tode Client application is a lightweight, React-based frontend designed to visualize the dependency structure of a Node.js project.

entry.title: kyuno053/lightweight-sdk-web-component

JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
entry.content: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
